The arc, arc\\_1, starts at [0.1815, 0.363], has a midpoint at [0.0, 0.1815], and ends at [0.1815, 0.0]. Loop\\_2 in face\\_1 consists of one circle. The circle, circle\\_1, has its center at [0.1815, 0.1815] and a radius of 0.1165. After creating the sketch, scale it using the scaling parameter sketch\\_scale, which is set to 0.75. Then, transform the scaled 2D sketch into a 3D sketch using the euler angles and translation vector from the coordinate system. Finally, extrude the 2D sketch to generate the 3D model. The extrusion properties include an extrude depth towards the normal of 0.0801 and no extrusion in the opposite direction. The boolean operation for this part is to create a new solid body. The dimensions of part 1 are as follows: length - 0.75, width - 0.0801, and height - 0.0801. Part 2: Two Cylinders with a Rectangular Shape in Between Construct a shape consisting of two cylinders connected by a rectangular shape. Begin by creating a new coordinate system. Set the Euler angles to [0.0, 0.0, 0.0] and the translation vector to [0.4884, 0.0214, 0.363]. Next, create the sketch for this part. It will be drawn on a plane defined by the coordinate system. The sketch consists of two faces - face\\_1 and face\\_2. Face\\_1 includes one loop - loop\\_1. Loop\\_1 consists of one circle. The circle, circle\\_1, has its center at [0.008, 0.008] and a radius of 0.008. Face\\_2 also includes one loop - loop\\_1. Loop\\_1 consists of one circle. The circle, circle\\_1, has its center at [0.0747, 0.008] and a radius of 0.008. After creating the sketch, do not scale it. Then, transform the scaled 2D sketch into a 3D sketch using the euler angles and translation vector from the coordinate system. Finally, extrude the 2D sketch to generate the 3D model. The extrusion properties include no extrusion in the direction of the normal and an extrude depth in the opposite direction of 0.0667. The boolean operation for this part is to cut out materials from the existing body. The dimensions of part 2 are as follows: length - 0.0827, width - 0.0827, and height - 0.0667. The final shape of this CAD assembly is a three-dimensional, rectangular-shaped object with a hollow center, resembling a simplified representation of a metallic container or enclosure.</description>
